From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 film by Chris Soriano


The Wedding HustlerPosterDirected byChris SorianoWritten byChris SorianoProduced by

ProductioncompanyMatthew 25:14Distributed by1091 PicturesRelease date

Running time94 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
The Wedding Hustler is a 2023 American romantic comedy film written and directed by Chris Soriano. The film stars Soriano, Christine S. Chang, Hillary Soriano, Heart Evangelista and Kane Lim.


Plot[edit]
A wedding hustler helps a bride and groom throw a surprise wedding.

Cast[edit]
Chris Soriano as Chris
Christine S. Chang as The Wedding Planner
Hillary Soriano as Hillary
Heart Evangelista as Heart[1]
Kane Lim as Cam
Production[edit]
Principal photography happened in locations around San Diego, California including National City, Mission Valley and Pechanga Resort & Casino.[2] It is based on the Sorianos' own surprise wedding during the COVID-19 pandemic,[3] which took place on the first day of production.[4] Before she was cast, Chang was a real-life wedding planner in Southern California.[5] Heart Evangelista and Kane Lim were also cast.[6][3][7]

Release[edit]
The film was distributed by 1091 Pictures and was released on video on demand on February 7, 2023.[2]
